ComicInfo.Title: Clan-Building Chapter Three: Invitation Only
ComicInfo.Summary: There's going to be a Halloween party at the castle and while Goliath and Elisa decide to pursue those of their own species, in the long awaited 'double date' scenerio, Thailog obviously has other plans.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:16:48. [CVDB113249] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 22:18:21. [Issue ID 352437]
